docs.lead_paragraph: ROSENFIELD--Allan. The Board of Directors and staff of the Center for Reproductive Rights mourn the loss of Dr. Allan Rosenfield, our colleague, friend and hero. Allan was a visionary champion for women's reproductive health and early on recognized that women's ability to decide the number and spacing of their children and to survive pregnancy is a basic human right. Allan will be greatly missed and will always be an inspiration to take on injustice and never give up. Nancy Northup, President Center for Reproductive Rights

docs.lead_paragraph: This week's guest blogger is Bonnie Fuller, the C.E.O. of Bonnie Fuller Media. Most recently, Fuller served as vice president and chief editorial director of American Media (Star, Shape, Men's Fitness, Natural Health and Fit Pregnancy) and was previously editor in chief of US Weekly, Glamour, Cosmopolitan, Marie Claire, YM and Flare magazines. E-mail her at info@bonniefuller.com, follow her on Twitter here and read her previous columns.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Times recruited editors of college publications around the country to share their thoughts in real time, and they're back again for the last presidential debate of the 2008 campaign. Read their musings on the first debate and the vice presidential debate, and get to know them here.
